home.testimonial_1_content: The advanced trading strategies course completely changed my approach to the markets. I've increased my profitability by 300% in just 6 months!

get_started.question: How do I get started with a course?
get_started.answer: Simply enroll in any course and you'll get immediate access to all the content and resources.

final_purchases.question: Are all purchases final?
final_purchases.answer: Yes, all purchases are final. We encourage you to review course details and preview content before making a purchase to ensure it meets your needs.

mobile.question: Can I access courses on mobile?
mobile.answer: Absolutely! All our courses are optimized for mobile devices and tablets.

help_center_faq.create_account_question: How do I create an account?
help_center_faq.create_account_answer: Creating an account is simple! Click the 'Sign Up' button in the top navigation, fill in your details, and verify your email address. You'll receive a confirmation email with a verification link.
help_center_faq.purchase_course_question: How do I purchase a course?
help_center_faq.purchase_course_answer: Browse our course catalog, select the course you want, and click 'Buy Now'. You'll be redirected to our secure Stripe checkout. After successful payment, the course will be immediately available in your dashboard.
help_center_faq.mobile_access_question: Can I access courses on mobile devices?
help_center_faq.mobile_access_answer: Yes! Our platform is fully responsive and works on all devices including smartphones, tablets, and desktop computers. You can watch videos, track progress, and access all features from any device.
help_center_faq.course_access_duration_question: How long do I have access to purchased courses?
help_center_faq.course_access_duration_answer: You retain ongoing access to purchased courses as long as your account remains in good standing. You can rewatch lessons anytime from your dashboard.
help_center_faq.download_videos_answer: Currently, we don't support video downloads to ensure content protection. However, you can access all videos online from any device with an internet connection.
help_center_faq.internet_connection_question: What happens if I lose internet connection while watching?
help_center_faq.internet_connection_answer: Your progress is automatically saved. Simply reconnect to the internet and continue watching from where you left off.
help_center_faq.videos_not_loading_question: Videos are not loading properly. What should I do?
help_center_faq.videos_not_loading_answer: Try refreshing the page, clearing your browser cache, or using a different browser. If the problem persists, contact our support team.
help_center_faq.login_issues_question: I can't log into my account. What should I do?
help_center_faq.login_issues_answer: Make sure you're using the correct email and password. If you've forgotten your password, use the 'Forgot Password' link. If issues persist, contact support.
help_center_faq.video_player_issues_question: The video player is not working correctly.
help_center_faq.video_player_issues_answer: Try refreshing the page or clearing your browser cache. Make sure you have a stable internet connection. If the problem continues, contact support.
help_center_faq.certificate_question: How do I get a certificate of completion?
help_center_faq.certificate_answer: Certificates are automatically generated when you fully complete a course (all lessons completed and required watch time reached). You can download certificates from the 'My Certificates' section in your dashboard.
help_center_faq.share_certificate_question: Can I share my certificates on social media?
help_center_faq.share_certificate_answer: Yes! You can share your certificates on social media platforms. Use the share button on your certificate page to post it on your preferred platform.
help_center_faq.payment_methods_question: What payment methods do you accept?
help_center_faq.payment_methods_answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and payments through Stripe. All transactions are secure and encrypted.
help_center_faq.purchases_final_answer: Yes, all purchases are final. We encourage you to review course details and preview content before making a purchase to ensure it meets your needs.
help_center_faq.payment_security_answer: Absolutely! We use Stripe, a PCI-compliant payment processor, to handle all transactions. Your payment information is encrypted and never stored on our servers.

terms_content.hero_subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using {{appName}}. By using our platform, you agree to these terms and conditions.
terms_content.acceptance_content: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our website and services. By using our platform, you agree to these terms in full. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access our service.
terms_content.services_content: We provide online educational courses and related services. Our platform allows users to enroll in courses, access course materials, track progress, and earn certificates upon completion.
terms_content.user_accounts_content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.
terms_content.payment_terms_content: All course purchases are final. Payments are processed securely through our payment partners. Refunds are handled according to our refund policy, which can be found in our Help Center.
terms_content.intellectual_property_content: All course content, including videos, materials, and resources, is protected by copyright and intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or share course content without explicit permission.
terms_content.privacy_data_content: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
terms_content.contact_questions: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

privacy_content.hero_subtitle: We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data.
privacy_content.introduction_content: At {{appName}} ("we," "our," or "us"), we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services.
privacy_content.information_collection_content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, enroll in courses, make purchases, or contact us for support. This may include your name, email address, phone number, payment information, and course progress data.
privacy_content.how_we_use_content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process payments, communicate with you, and personalize your learning experience.
privacy_content.information_sharing_content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our platform, conducting business, or serving our users, as long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential.
privacy_content.data_security_content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy_content.your_rights_content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can manage your account settings and preferences through your dashboard.
privacy_content.cookies_content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our platform and hold certain information to enhance your user experience.
privacy_content.changes_content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website and updating the "Last updated" date.
privacy_content.contact_questions: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
